home.heroTitle: Less rush. More connection. A caf√© afternoon that works for everyone.
home.heroText: Little Beans combines warm childcare for kids under 8 with a welcoming space for parents, carers, and coffee lovers.
home.welcomeText: Whether you want to take a breath, finish a task, or meet other families, we make afternoons feel safe and easy.
home.previewSubtitle: A quick overview ‚Äî open each page for full details.
home.previewHowText: From check-in to pickup: clear steps, calm care, and friendly communication.
home.previewBenefitsText: Why families, carers, and kids feel welcome at Little Beans.
home.previewPricingText: Estimate your session cost in seconds and choose the right setup.

how.title: How your Little Beans afternoon works
how.subtitle: Simple, transparent, and kind ‚Äî so children and adults both feel comfortable.
how.step1Text: Families arrive between 1:30‚Äì2:00 PM and meet the childcare team.
how.step2Text: Children join age-appropriate activities, stories, and quiet nap corners.
how.step3Text: Parents and other adults can work, chat, or simply enjoy a peaceful coffee break.

pricing.title: Pricing and interactive visit planner
pricing.subtitle: Estimate your session online and adapt it to your family.
pricing.noteText: Sibling discounts are applied automatically. Ask us about monthly options for regular visits.

faq.eyebrow: Questions? We are happy to help.
faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers about routines, safety, and booking.
faq.q1: What age range is this for?
faq.a1: Our sessions are designed for children aged 2 to 8.
faq.q2: How does check-in and pickup safety work?
faq.a2: Each child has secure sign-in and sign-out. Only authorized adults can pick up.
faq.a3: Yes, if places are available. For regular routines, we recommend booking ahead.
faq.a4: If needed, please bring spare clothes, a water bottle, and important notes (allergies, sleep routine).
faq.moreText: Send us a message ‚Äî we reply quickly and kindly.

contact.eyebrow: We look forward to meeting you
contact.title: Contact & booking request
contact.subtitle: Send your request ‚Äî we usually reply within 24 hours.

home.title: What you will find on this page
home.text: This homepage gives you a quick overview of Little Beans, highlights key benefits, and guides you to flow, pricing, FAQ, and contact pages.

how.title: What this page explains
how.text: This page walks you through each session step by step, including the daily structure and what both children and adults can expect.

benefits.title: What this page explains
benefits.text: This page summarizes the biggest benefits for families: safety, thoughtful care, calm adult spaces, and real community support.

pricing.title: What this page explains
pricing.text: Use this page to estimate costs, compare options, and understand which session setup best matches your family needs.

faq.title: What this page explains
faq.text: This page answers common questions about age range, safety, booking, and preparation in a short and clear format.

contact.title: What this page explains
contact.text: This page is for direct booking requests. Share your details and we will reply with suitable time options.

activities.title: What this page explains
activities.text: Here you can explore current activity zones for children and quickly see which options fit different moods and ages.

community.title: What this page explains
community.text: This page shows upcoming community events and helps you find the most relevant offerings for your family situation.
